description.value: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole. Choose any two of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip]. Attempt both of the attacks you chose against the same or different creatures, but don't apply the multiple attack penalty until after resolving both attacks.
